layout.title: Centralia Travel Agency
layout.description: Discover unforgettable journeys with Centralia Travel Agency. Explore customized tours, cultural experiences, and hassle-free travel to top destinations worldwide. Book your next adventure today!

footer.description: Your trusted gateway to Central Asia's hidden treasures. We craft extraordinary journeys that go beyond the ordinary, connecting you with authentic experiences and lasting memories.
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Centralia Travel. All Rights Reserved.

head.title: Discover the Heart of Central Asia
head.description: Embark on extraordinary journeys through ancient Silk Road cities, pristine mountains, and vibrant cultures

countries.title: Explore Central Asia
countries.description: From ancient Silk Road cities to pristine mountine lakes, each destination offers extraordinary experiense waiting to be discovered

items.title: Uzbekistan
items.description: Anciend Silk Road cities and magnificent Islamic architecture

items.title: Kazakhstan
items.description: Endless steppes and authentic nomadic heritage

items.title: Kyrgyzstan
items.description: Pristine mountain lakes and alpine adventures

items.title: Tajikistan
items.description: Roof of the world and ancient mountain cultures

signatureJourneys.title: Signature Journeys
signatureJourneys.description: Discover our best-selling adventures chosen by thousands of travelers

items.title: 15-Day Silk Road Explorer
items.description: Journey through Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, exploring ancient cities, stunning architecture, and timeless nomadic traditions along the legendary trade routes.

items.title: 10-Day Nomadic Heritage Journey
items.description: Experience authentic nomadic culture in Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan with traditional yurt stays and horseback adventures across pristine landscapes.

items.title: 12-Day Pamir Highway Adventure
items.description: Conquer the world's second-highest international highway through Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan's most spectacular mountain ranges and remote valleys.

travelersComment.title: What Our Travelers Say
travelersComment.description: Real experiences from real adventurers who've explored Central Asia with us

items.comment: Absolutely incredible experience! The architecture in Samarkand is breathtaking, and our guide was so knowledgeable about the history.
The most adventurous trip of my life! The landscapes are otherworldly and the local hospitality is amazing.
Perfect blend of nature and culture. The lake is stunning and the nomad experience was authentic.

travelInsights.title: Travel Insights
travelInsights.description: Expert guides, cultural insights, and practical tips to help you make the most of your Central Asian adventure

items.title: Best Time to Visit the Stans: A Seasonal Guide
items.description: Discover the optimal seasons for exploring Central Asia, from spring wildflowers to autumn harvests and winter adventures.

items.title: Navigating Central Asian Visas: Complete Guide
items.description: Everything you need to know about visa requirements, applications, and border crossings for seamless travel.

items.title: Cultural Etiquette: Respectful Travel in Central Asia
items.description: Learn the customs, traditions, and social norms to enhance your cultural connections and travel experiences.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: Our team constantly works towards putting their experience and knowledge to good use by helping you coordinate a hassle-free hut-to-hut hiking holiday.
AboutPage.title2: Hey, I'm Samo. Let me introduce you to the story behind Hut to Hut Hiking Austria.
AboutPage.description2: Like every great adventure, we started small, with a close-knit group of young, enthusiastic hikers who loved nothing more than spending our days in nature. While Iâm usually the first person youâll hear from â replying to your emails or chatting with you on a video call to help pick the perfect trail â Iâm really just the starting point. Behind me is a whole team of hikers, travel advisors, and route planners who live and breathe the trails we send you on.
AboutPage.title3: From Local Trails to Worldwide Adventures
AboutPage.description3: Based in Slovenia, where the Julian Alps begin just beyond our doorstep, it felt only natural to start sharing the beauty of our homelandâand eventually, the worldâwith others. What started as a small initiative has grown into something far bigger. As more and more travellers joined our hikes, our team expanded too, bringing in destination experts, trail planners, route designers, and a behind-the-scenes support team.Step by step, our hiking portfolio grew beyond Slovenia, across Europe, and eventually to the most scenic trails in Asia and the Americas. With so many epic journeys under our belt, it became clear that we needed one united identity to bring it all together.

items.title: Samo â Lead Travel Advisoy
items.info: Samo's love for the mountains started in his childhood, sparked by the books of Slovenian alpinists like TomaÅ¾ Humar and Silvo Karo. He found their Himalayan adventures so inspiring that he dedicated himself to summiting the Slovenian Alps. During his college years, he made his first ascents as an alpinist, which brought him closer to his childhood idols. These days, he devotes his time to trail running but remains a frequent visitor of the mountains.
